headline: Booking Holdings AI Push And KAYAK CEO Shift Raise Valuation Questions
summary: Booking Holdings (NasdaqGS:BKNG) has appointed Peer Bueller as CEO of KAYAK. Co founder and longtime KAYAK CEO Steve Hafner is stepping into a new role focused on AI for Booking Holdings. The leadership transition highlights Booking Holdings' focus on AI development across its travel platforms. Booking Holdings, parent of brands like KAYAK, operates online travel and accommodation platforms that sit at the center of how people research and book trips. The move to place a dedicated CEO at...
